# NFC device binding relationship


## NFC Binding


**Interface address**: `/business-app/v1/nfc/bind`


**Request method**: `POST`


**Request data type**: `application/json`


**Response data type**: `*/*`


**Interface Description**:


**Request Example**:


```javascript
{
  "assetId": "",
  "bindType": 0,
  "dpIds": [],
  "extraData": {},
  "name": "",
  "targetId": "",
  "uuid": ""
}
```


**Request Parameters**:


| Parameter name | Parameter description | Request type | Required | Data type | Schema |
| -------- | -------- | ----- | -------- | -------- | ------ |
|nfcBindDTO|NFC settings|body|true|NfcBindDTO|NfcBindDTO|
|  assetId|assetID||false|string||
|  bindType|Binding type (1=network configuration, 2=one-click execution, 3=device panel, 4=quick switch, 5=device group)||false|integer||
|  dpIds|Function point ID (when binding type is 4 or 5, set the quick switch DPID)||false|array|string|
|  extraData|Extended data key-value pair||false|object||
|  name|NFC name||false|string||
|  targetId|Target ID (bind_type=1: product ID, bind_type=2: one-click execution ID, bind_type=3: device ID, bind_type=4: device ID, bind_type=5: device group ID)||false|string||
|  uuid|NFC-UUID||false|string||


**Response Status**:


| Status code | Description | Schema |
| -------- | -------- | ----- |
|200|OK|ResponseResult object«boolean»|
|201|Created||
|401|Unauthorized||
|403|Forbidden||
|404|Not Found||


**Response parameters**:


| Parameter name | Parameter description | Type | schema |
| -------- | -------- | ----- |----- |
|code|Response status code|integer(int32)|integer(int32)|
|data|Response data|boolean||
|message|Response message|string||
|reqId|Request ID|string||
|time|Request timestamp (10 bits)|integer(int64)|integer(int64)|


**Sample response**:
```javascript
{
	"code": 200,
	"data": true,
	"message": "success",
	"reqId": "4a0ede228f9f6fac",
	"time": 1620641786
}
```


## Get NFC binding content


**Interface address**: `/business-app/v1/nfc/getBindRefsByUUIDs`


**Request method**: `POST`


**Request data type**: `application/json`


**Response data type**: `*/*`


**Interface Description**:


**Request Example**:


```javascript
{
  "bindType": 0,
  "targetId": "",
  "uuids": []
}
```


**Request Parameters**:


| Parameter name | Parameter description | Request type | Required | Data type | Schema |
| -------- | -------- | ----- | -------- | -------- | ------ |
|query|query|body|true|NfcBindRefsQuery|NfcBindRefsQuery|
|  bindType|Binding type (1=network configuration, 2=one-click execution, 3=device panel, 4=common switch)||false|integer||
|  targetId|Target ID (bind_type=1: product ID, bind_type=2: one-click execution ID, bind_type=3: device ID, bind_type=4: common switch)||false|string||
|  uuids|NFC UUIDs||false|array|string|


**Response Status**:


| Status code | Description | Schema |
| -------- | -------- | ----- |
|200|OK|ResponseResult object«List«NfcBindRefsVO»»|
|201|Created||
|401|Unauthorized||
|403|Forbidden||
|404|Not Found||


**Response parameters**:


| Parameter name | Parameter description | Type | schema |
| -------- | -------- | ----- |----- |
|code|Response status code|integer(int32)|integer(int32)|
|data|Response data|array|NfcBindRefsVO|
|  appId|Application ID|string||
|  assetId|asset ID|string||
|  bindTime|bind time|string||
|  bindType|Binding type (1=network configuration, 2=one-click execution, 3=device panel, 4=quick switch, 5=device group)|integer||
|  extraData|Extended Data|string||
|  id|Unique ID|string||
|  nfcName|NFC name|string||
|  nfcUuid|nfc_uuid|string||
|  switchDpList|Quick switch DP point list|array|DeviceDpInfoVO|
|    dpJson|functionjson|string||
|    id|dp point ID|string||
|    imageUrl|Function point icon|string||
|    key|attribute identifier|string||
|    linkageDataType|Linkage data type (1=condition, 2=action)|integer||
|    name|attribute name|string||
|    specs|model|string||
|    value|Function event|object||
|    valueCastType|(0=original value, 1=percentage)|integer||
|  targetId|Target ID (bind_type=1: product ID, bind_type=2: one-click execution ID, bind_type=3: device ID, bind_type=4: device ID, bind_type=5: device group ID)|string||
|  userId|Bind user|string||
|message|Response message|string||
|reqId|Request ID|string||
|time|Request timestamp (10 bits)|integer(int64)|integer(int64)|


**Sample response**:
```javascript
{
	"code": 200,
	"data": [
		{
			"appId": "",
			"assetId": "",
			"bindTime": "",
			"bindType": 0,
			"extraData": "",
			"id": "",
			"nfcName": "",
			"nfcUuid": "",
			"switchDpList": [
				{
					"dpJson": "",
					"id": "",
					"imageUrl": "",
					"key": "",
					"linkageDataType": 0,
					"name": "",
					"specs": "",
					"value": {},
					"valueCastType": 0
				}
			],
			"targetId": "",
			"userId": ""
		}
	],
	"message": "success",
	"reqId": "4a0ede228f9f6fac",
	"time": 1620641786
}
```

**Request data type**: `application/json`


**Response data type**: `*/*`


**Interface Description**:


**Request Parameters**:


| Parameter name | Parameter description | Request type | Required | Data type | Schema |
| -------- | -------- | ----- | -------- | -------- | ------ |
|deviceId|device id|query|false|string||


**Response Status**:


| Status code | Description | Schema |
| -------- | -------- | ----- |
|200|OK|ResponseResult object «Inverter statistics results»|
|201|Created||
|401|Unauthorized||
|403|Forbidden||
|404|Not Found||


**Response parameters**:


| Parameter name | Parameter description | Type | schema |
| -------- | -------- | ----- |----- |
|code|Response status code|integer(int32)|integer(int32)|
|data|Response data|Inverter statistics results|Inverter statistics results|

|  todayPower|Today's power generation|string||

```javascript
	},
	"message": "success",

	"time": 1620641786
}
```

# [App side] Network configuration guidance related (new version)


## Get the network configuration guidance data according to the app network configuration category ID (manual network configuration for APP category)


**Interface address**: `/business-app/v1/networkGuide/getByAppProductTypeId`


**Request method**: `POST`


**Request data type**: `application/json`


**Response data type**: `*/*`


**Interface Description**:


**Request Parameters**:


| Parameter name | Parameter description | Request type | Required | Data type | Schema |
| -------- | -------- | ----- | -------- | -------- | ------ |
|appProductTypeId|APP network category ID|query|false|string||
|deviceType|Device type (android,ios,android_pad,ios_pad,windows)|query|false|string||


**Response Status**:


| Status code | Description | Schema |
| -------- | -------- | ----- |
|200|OK|ResponseResult object«ReactNativePackageVO object»|
|201|Created||
|401|Unauthorized||
|403|Forbidden||
|404|Not Found||


**Response parameters**:


| Parameter name | Parameter description | Type | schema |
| -------- | -------- | ----- |----- |
|code|Response status code|integer(int32)|integer(int32)|
|data|Response data|ReactNativePackageVO object|ReactNativePackageVO object|
|  createTime|Creation time|string||
|  deviceType|Device type (android,ios,android_pad,ios_pad,windows)|string||
|  distributionNetModes|List of supported network distribution modes|array|integer|
|  downloadUrl|Download address|string||
|  guideList||array|AppProductTypeGuideVO|
|    appId|Application ID|string||
|    config|Configuration information (format: {"title":"Reset device","subTitle":"Subtitle","showRadio":true,"radioText":"Confirm that the above operation is correct","buttonText":"The device has been reset","steps":[{"sortNum":1,"text":"Text","imageUrl":"http://xxxx.jpg"}]})|string||
|    configDTO||ConfigDTO|ConfigDTO|
|      buttonText|Button text|string||
|      radioText|Radio text|string||
|      showRadio|Show radio button|boolean||
|      steps|step list|array|Step|
|        aspectRatio|Extended information|string||
|        imageUrl|Image address|string||
|        sortNum|Serial number|integer||
|        text|Copywriting|string||
|      subTitle|Subtitle|string||
|      title|title|string||
|    createBy|creator|string||
|    createTime|Creation time|string||
|    guideId|Network configuration guide ID|string||
|    guideImage|Network image|string||
|    guideVideo|Network distribution video|string||
|    is5g|Whether to support 5G|boolean||
|    isShow|Whether to display (0 no, 1 yes), default 1|integer||
|    mustWifiPwd|Is it necessary to enter the WIFI password?|boolean||
|    netModel|Network configuration mode: 1:WIFI+BLE; 2:WIFI; 3:BLE; 4:QrCode; 5:Barcode; 6:AP; 7:Wired;|integer||
|    refId|Association ID (when appId=0, associate with the third-level category ID, otherwise associate with the app distribution network category ID)|string||
|    updateBy|Modifier|string||
|    updateTime|Modification time|string||
|  md5|md5|string||
|  packageId|primary key id|string||
|  protocol|protocol encoding|string||
|  rnId|primary key id|string||
|  updateTime|Update time|string||
|message|Response message|string||
|reqId|Request ID|string||
|time|Request timestamp (10 bits)|integer(int64)|integer(int64)|

```javascript
	"code": 200,
	"data": {
		"createTime": "",
		"deviceType": "",
		"distributionNetModes": [],
		"downloadUrl": "",

			{
				"appId": "",
				"config": "",

					"buttonText": "",

						{
							"aspectRatio": "",

				},
				"createBy": "",
				"createTime": "",
				"guideId": "",
				"guideImage": "",

				"netModel": 0,
				"refId": "",
				"updateBy": "",
				"updateTime": ""
			}

		"md5": "",
		"packageId": "",
		"protocol": "",
		"rnId": "",
```
